mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS pid, r.id AS rid, m.id AS mid, m.name AS mname, m.fee AS mfee,p.count AS pcount,isdistributed AS pisdistributed FROM prescription p,register r,medicine m WHERE p.mid=m.id
limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into prescription (rid,mid,mname,mfee,count,isdistributed) values (${id}, #{medicine.id}, (select name from medicine where medicine.id=#{medicine.id}), (select fee from medicine where medicine.id=#{medicine.id}), #{count},#{isdistributed});
